amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit DoD from establishing new DEI administrator positions and/or taking actions to fill vacancies in currently existing DEI billets.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Department of Defense from establishing new DEI administrator positions and/or taking actions to fill vacancies in currently existing DEI billets.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 213 (Roll no. 324).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Burlison.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 213 (Roll no. 324).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
